title: Project Patcher: Project Metadata File
description: The metadata of a project file for constructing a project with Project Patcher.

type.description: The type of the project file.

dir.description: The directory relative to the working directory that the project files should be placed within. If none is specified, it defaults to the working directory.
dir.$comment: TODO: Add validation for relative directory

id.description: A five alphanumeric character string representing an OSF project.

url.description: A URL containing the file to query via a HTTP GET request.

repository.description: An identifier representing the location of a git repository.

^(branch)|(tag)|(commit)$.description: The location to checkout the repository to. If none is specified, the default branch will be used.
